section.heading: Tred Avon River.
section.text: The Tred Avon River encompasses all the waters of the Tred Avon River and its tributaries northeasterly of a line beginning at a point, at or near Lat. 38° 40.250' N., Long. 76° 11.867' W., then running 73° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 40.550' N., Long. 76° 10.617' W.

section.heading: Tred Avon River at Oxford.
section.text: The Tred Avon River at Oxford encompasses the area beginning at a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.592' N., Long. 76° 10.608' W., then running 279° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.607' N., Long. 76° 10.723' W., then running 64° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.868' N., Long. 76° 10.053' W., then running 178° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.790' N., Long. 76° 10.050' W. This area has a 6-knot speed limit at all times during the boating season.

section.heading: Town Creek.
section.text: Town Creek encompasses the area beginning at a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.857' N., Long. 76° 9.910' W., then running 276° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.868' N., Long. 76° 10.053' W., then running 178° (True) to a point, at or near Lat. 38° 41.790' N., Long. 76° 10.050' W., and running to the head of the creek. This area has a 6-knot speed limit all year.

section.heading: Dixon Creek — Eastern Branch.
section.text: Dixon Creek — Eastern Branch encompasses all the waters of Dixon Creek beginning at a point at or near Lat. 38º.45.990’ N., Long. 76º6.7100’ W., then running 288º True to a point, at or near Lat. 38º46.03’ N., Long. 76º6.870’ W., then running 108º True to the point of beginning. This area has a 6-knot speed limit Saturdays, Sundays, and State holidays during the boating season.
